metadata.title: CVE-2020-27793 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An off-by-one overflow flaw was found in radare2 due to mismatched arraylength in core_java.c. This could allow an attacker to cause a crash, andperform a denail of service attack.

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
